plot: A freelance journalist is hired by a psychiatrist to investigate the death of a patient, but as the case progresses he fears he is being groomed to replace the dead man. Or worse: join him.
title: Opus K
plot_es: A freelance journalist is hired by a psychiatrist to investigate the death of a patient, but as the case progresses he fears he is being groomed to replace the dead man. Or worse: join him.
plot_en: A freelance journalist is hired by a psychiatrist to investigate the death of a patient, but as the case progresses he fears he is being groomed to replace the dead man. Or worse: join him.
